moves.name: Cross Poison
moves.effect: Critical hits land more easily. Has a very small chance of leaving the target poisoned.

moves.name: Dire Hit +
moves.effect: Sharply raises the user’s critical-hit rate.

moves.name: Venom Drench
moves.effect: Lowers the target’s Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed if the target is poisoned or badly poisoned. Fails if the target is not poisoned or badly poisoned.

moves.name: Move Like the Wind!
moves.effect: Sharply raises the user’s Speed and evasiveness.

syncMove.name: Ninja Spirit Cross Poison
syncMove.description: Its power increases if the target is poisoned or badly poisoned.

passives.name: Hostile Environment 1
passives.description: Raises the chance of inflicting status conditions with the additional effects of moves.
